text.section: The State of Maryland assents to the federal acts.

The State Treasurer shall:
Be the custodian of any money received under the federal acts; and
Disburse this money in accordance with the federal acts.
The State Board of Education shall be the sole State agency responsible for the administration of the Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Act.
